member.name: M:Microsoft.IT.Security.Enforcement.IContextHandlerService.RouteAccessRequest(System.Collections.Generic.IList{Microsoft.IT.Security.Enforcement.DataEntities.Request})
member.summary:
RouteAccessRequest web method will route the request to Policy Decision point for access control and return authorization decision based on applicable security policies. This method will return list of Response object.
ParameterRequirement
requestsRequired

remarks.para: This WEB method returns the list of Response object.

item.description: authorization decisions, this is standard defined in XACML specification(Permit,Deny,NonApplicable,Indertimnate).
status details, including any failure, errors which occured during authorization process(Context Handler, PDP,PIP,Obligation Service)

remarks.para: This WEB method accept the list of Request object which contains access control request data.

item.description: identity data type, this is standard list defeined in EnforcementDataEntityConstants (Certificate,SecurityAssertionMarkupLanguageToken,Windows, Others).
identity binary data, which could be claim, SAML token, etc.
specific policy name tenant applications want to use to apply against request and get authorization decision
specific policy version tenant applications want to use to apply against request and get authorization decision
request target attributes used for matching in security policies.
search targets used for searching applicable security policies.
